title.narrative: Provision of Education, Health, and GBV services for refugees in Galkacyo

description.narrative: In collaboration with UNHCR, Relief International is working to respond to the needs of Refugees in Galkacyo by building a holistic framework that ensures access to medical services, formal education, enhancing livelihoods capacities of refugees for self reliance and GBV protection and response. RI will cover four sectors: Health, Education, Vocational/life saving training and GBV. Other existing similar projects in Galkacyo hospital and girl child education will compliment this initiative. In this program, RI is improving access to primary and secondary education to refugee children in Galkacyo, as well as, improving livelihoods and self-reliance of refugees through vocational training/Life saving skill training. We are working on providing counseling and support to persons with specific needs (people with disabilities, traumatized /mentally ill, SGBV survivors traumatized school children, as well as those requiring specialized care etc.). Lastly, RI is facilitating the referral of Persons of concern who needs further medical care.
